title: This Tool Will Give You A Perfect Cat Eye In Seconds

og.title: This Tool Will Give You A Perfect Cat Eye In Seconds
og.description: This is not a drill: Cat eyes will soon take you less than a minute to create. The Vamp Stamp is the newest tool that allows you to create a perfectly winged shape in 5 seconds or less—no, we’re not kidding. (Watch the video below for proof.) As…
